column5: any have a tassimo machine  buddies at work loves these machines  and you get coffee/latte/capucino/tea/hot chocolate in 30 seconds  there are 2 bosch models which is better and braun has one also  thanks  Troy
you will have to change your name to starbucks

LOL  the wife walks in today, hi hun just got back from crappytire and i tried this sample of coffee wow was it good!  ...she plop's down the little flyer/coupon on my desk...guess what the make and model was.. needless to say after she said you have to use bottle water or buy a water softner i kicked her out of my office...enough needless spending already.gawd dont you know we are in a recession!  besides i gots to buy me a new moose gun and more fishing gear martha...gheese
We have one at work and its great.  We just use regular tap water.  My fav is the hot chocolate and green tea.  Joey
I have a Kuerig.  It is great.  Similar design...have a look.

The coffee packages will put you in the poorhouse.  A cost saving tip for you.  Skip the latte and capuccino milk containers.  Just blast 1/2 cup milk in the microwave till it just boils then use the Expresso pack for the Tassimo right into the milk in the cup.  Tastes better, its hotter and almost free!.
I have a Bosch model and I like it just fine and yes the discs cost more than regular coffee but certainly less than the coffee shops.
